description: Scrapes a web page given its URL for HTML or Text and Markdown (LLM accessible), powered by smart residential prox rotation and anti-bot bypass capabilities.

apiKey.description: Your Scrapfly API key from https://scrapfly.io/dashboard

capabilities.name: info_account
capabilities.description: Get subscription, usage, limits. Use for quotas/billing/concurrency. Avoid for content scraping.

capabilities.name: info_api_key
capabilities.description: Return the Users' ScrapFly API key

capabilities.name: scraping_instruction_enhanced
capabilities.description: Return critical instructions for scraping tools

capabilities.name: web_get_page
